attributes.action: make  foreign  drivers  take a british driving  test before allowing them to take a british job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel we make it to easy for companies to employ  foreign drivers when our standards of driving are higher and most aacidents are caused by foreign drivers falling asleep at the wheel plus they are not used to driving right hand drive vehicles and thereby preventing them from driving british lorries/buses without taking a test first
